top_up_amount = #{topUpAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
withdraw_amount = #{withdrawAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
income_amount = #{incomeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(statistics_date, '%Y%m%d') from capital_platform_unit_fund_statistics where is_delete=0;

select cpufs.income_amount incomeAmount,cpufs.expenses_amount expensesAmount, cpufs.top_up_amount topUpAmount, cpufs.withdraw_amount withdrawAmount, cpufs.statistics_date statisticsDate from capital_platform_unit_fund_statistics cpufs where is_delete=0
and DATE_FORMAT(statistics_date, '%Y%m%d')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y%m%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(statistics_date, '%Y%m%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y%m%d')
select count(*) from capital_platform_unit_fund_statistics cpufs where statistics_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
